itinerary.name: Visit Nairobi National Park, Giraffe Centre, and Karen Blixen Museum
Boat ride on Lake Naivasha and a walking safari on Crescent Island
Game drive and cultural visit to Maasai village
Morning balloon safari and wildlife photography
Shopping at Maasai Market and prepare for coastal trip
Arrive and tour Fort Jesus, Old Town, and Mombasa Tusks
Spend the day at Haller Park and visit Bombolulu Workshops
Beach relaxation, snorkeling, and camel ride on the beach
Visit Colobus Conservation Centre and explore Shimba Hills
Return to Nairobi and depart
Hike Mt. Longonot
itinerary.description: Enjoy the scenic crater rim hike.

itinerary.name: Relax at Lake Elementaita
Dine at Carnivore Restaurant
Beach BBQ Dinner
Nature walk in Arabuko Sokoke Forest
itinerary.description: Guided walk in Kenya's coastal forest.

itinerary.name: Glass Bottom Boat Tour
itinerary.description: Coral reef viewing from a boat.

itinerary.name: Explore Nairobi Railway Museum
Zip lining at Kereita Forest
Camel Ride on Malindi Beach
itinerary.description: A fun morning ride on the beach.

itinerary.name: Sunset Cruise at Mida Creek
itinerary.description: Beautiful sunset on a dhow boat.
